website_summaries.verdict: This styling clay can be used to define, shape, and add texture to all hair types.
pros: Moroccan lava clay adds hold without adding shine
Easily style with fingers or comb
Doesn't leave residue and smells slightly herbal
cons: Some users found it to be too sticky

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Buy directly from Aveda for less.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. However, it's worth noting that this product can be purchased for less directly from Aveda. Generally, the Aveda.com purchase price is $25/unit. I might be more understanding if this product was Prime eligible, but it's not. $37 is quite a markup.
customer_reviews.author: Reynaldo M Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: No gloss, medium hold, high satisfaction.
customer_reviews.text: I love this clay for several reasons: It's a medium hold, so my hair still moves without breaking the hold like gel does, and it's a matte surface, so my hair doesn't look constantly wet. I have very fine hair, so I only need a few dabs to get everything held in place, and it doesn't glue my hair to my head, so I still get good volume. If you have medium-to-fine hair and want something matte to do the side-part hairstyle with minimal maintenance, I highly recommend the Aveda Grooming Clay. It is kind of expensive, but also one pot lasts me several months, so it's not too bad. Your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Bond

customer_reviews.title: Best hair product I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I have short/medium length wavy hair and this product allows me sculpt it to sweep back from my forehead and stays up all day long. The smell is pleasant, and it's easy to apply and cleanup. A little bit of this goes a long way, with one tub lasting my for about 3 months, maybe longer. I used to be an America Crew guy, but this product beats their grooming clay hands down.
customer_reviews.author: R. Walter

customer_reviews.title: Works great, smells horrible
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, easy to apply, holds well, very little residue. Perfect in that sense. Unfortunately it smells horrible, almost caustic smelling... very sharp and unpleasant, like the worst smell in a hair salon If they could fix the smell then it would be perfect

customer_reviews.title: Works great for thicker hair
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great when you need a light-to-moderate hold with low shine, even for thicker hair. It does have a scent similar to products that have tea tree oil in them, so if you don't like that smell, this grooming clay might not be for you. It doesn't seem very strong smelling to me and feels like it fades pretty quickly after using it, but your mileage may vary.

customer_reviews.text: literally the best men's hair product on the market. I only wish it wasn't so expensive!! -You can rework your hair after use -Has excellent hold (you can hold up very straight hair that normally flops down) -It does not leave your hair crusty -It does not leave your hair looking wet or shiny or greasy -Smells nice (like lavender I guess) -It's water soluble, so you can "brush it in" with a bit of water to make it easier -Not too waxy -Not greasy Please, please, please will someone copy this product and make a knock off? customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Always count on Aveda
customer_reviews.text: I always keep coming back to this Aveda clay, I keep on experimenting with other brands that are half the price but they just don't cut it. Great clay, light enough so you don't feel it's in your hair, firm enough to keep a natural-looking hold. I particularly like that it's water-based and washes out and off your hands with just water, hate the oily residue types you can buy from other cheaper brands. I'm not experimenting anymore..Aveda, you have a life long customer in me!

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: For my dollar, the best styling cream you can buy. Matte finish, great “Aveda” smell, perfect hold.
customer_reviews.author: Sigma

customer_reviews.title: nothing is better than this
customer_reviews.text: I've tried like 20 other similar products and this styling clay is absolutely flawless. It lasts until I wash my hair, whether that's one day, or even three. I can run my fingers through it, put a hat on, anything, and one swipe of my fingers gets it back to exactly how I like to wear it. Also, one of these jars lasts me about 6 months. Highly recommended to anyone with short hair!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Only product that works
customer_reviews.text: I have the finest, flattest hair. This is the only product that has ever worked to give my hair some lift w/o weighing it down. It is expensive, but the container lasts forever (for short hair anyway). It’s still waaay cheaper than buying another brand and then tossing it when it doesn’t work.

customer_reviews.title: Over powering perfume oder
customer_reviews.text: The product works well - but the oder/scent is overpowering. They should take down the perfume level by an order of magnitude.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Overall, an excellent product. Pros: Nice amount of malleable hold with good thickening effect. Doesn't make hair too sticky. Matte finish. Cons: Not crazy about the smell (wish someone would make a men's product that is unscented), although it's not overbearing and I'm starting to get used to it. Expensive - but you don't need a lot with each application. Other products tried: Personally (for my short-to-medium length, medium texture hair), it works better for me than the American Crew Fiber and the Bumble & Bumble Styling Creme.
customer_reviews.author: fat cat

customer_reviews.title: I have fine, curly hair and this product
customer_reviews.text: I have fine, curly hair and this product, run through my hair before drying, adds volume and prevents frizz. Love the smell, too.

product_meta.title: Aveda Men Pure-Formance Grooming Clay 75ml/2.5oz
product_meta.description: Adds texture, thickness and definition to hair. Lightweight micro-fibres flex, so the hold is pliable yet strong. Delivers a natural, matte finish. Our Pure-Formance Grooming Clay adds strong hold without adding shine. Its light-weight, micro-fibres provide the control you need to create any style with a comb or your fingers. Perfect for adding thickness to hair. Rich, spicy and refreshing aroma with kunzea, citrus and certified organic essential oils of spearmint, vetiver, and lavender Ingredients: Spearmint: Used in ancient times to scent bath water, heal sore gums and whiten teeth, this light, minty oil has an uplifting aroma. Its leaves are often steeped in tea as an herbal remedy for heartburn, nausea and digestive ailments. Licorice: Also known as "sweet wood," this is an anti-irritant. 75ml
